text:
Dear,
My name is Alex Dupont, i'm 18 years old and i'm student in information and communication bachelor degree's in the city of Paris in Paris.
firstly, i want to explain to you why i choose this bachelor degree's  and what inspires me for taking this decision.
Since i was younger i enjoyed to discover the world of communication, marketing and media but i wasn't sure about what i want to do seriously in my professional life.
But it's not a big deal because when i was in the high school at Angers, i was obligated  to make an internship during 4 weeks and i did my training period at an agency  situated at Angers.  This agency is a center for help the children to do their homework with part time teacher and
my tasks was to : sort some document filing, find  new customers for  the agency with gmail and making some digital art for the children.
I appreciated this training period because i found lot of news customer for this agency, i  loved to show my creativity with my digital creation. It's make me so happy to see the good reaction of my tutor who was the director of this agency.
I enjoyed also my relationship with people in this agency and my skills.
Thanks to this training period i decided to study Communication and becoming a communication director in an international company in the futur because i love digital, the art side and history of communication.
This is my story, i  hope you enjoyed. Have a nice day.
